messages.subject: Intro from the UK
messages.msgSnippet: Dear all, I ve been on this list a while now and thought it was about time I said hello.  I m Emma, mum to Chloe (5) and Ethan (16 months), my partner is Paul
messages.messageBody:
Dear all,

I've been on this list a while now and thought it was about time I said hello. I'm Emma, mum to Chloe (5) and Ethan (16 months), my partner is Paul a web designer. We are in the UK, a few miles north of London and have recently taken the plunge into home education. Unschooling (or autonomous learning as it's called here) is the area of home ed that I'm very much drawn to. When my daughter came out of school (she was there for 6 months) she said she was happy to be in 'mummy school'..just recently she came out with ' I don't want to be in any school, not even mummy school - I just want to be me.' :)

She enjoys drawing and maths and loves being out doors so we do a lot of this whenever she wants - my younger one is very easy going and is happy to be involved in whatever we are doing or else entertain himself.

I just wanted to say how I've enjoyed reading all the posts and I look forward to learning a lot

warm wishes
Emma

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
